CodeList.Name: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption Questions Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption Questions test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: AUDIT-C - How Often Have Alcohol Drink

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADTC01-Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: AUDIT-C - How Many Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADTC01-Six or More Drinks One Occasion
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: AUDIT-C - How Often Have Six or More Drinks
